subject: Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: In an upset Saturday, the Longhorns beat the Sooners, 24-17, perhaps granting themselves and Strong a bit of a reprieve from the doubt surrounding the program.
snippet: In an upset Saturday, the Longhorns beat the Sooners, 24-17, perhaps granting themselves and Strong a bit of a reprieve from the doubt surrounding the program.
